Japanese:
<S0>あたまは ヘルメットじょうの
カバーで まもられている<*4>
English:
Its head is protected by
a helmet-like cover.<*4>
Draft version: Its head is protected by a helmet-like cover.

Japanese:
<S0>こまかい はで どんなもの
でも かみきってしまう<*4>
English:
Can't help but gnaw
through everything it
comes across
using its small teeth.<*4>
Draft version:
Can't help but gnaw through everything it comes across
using its small teeth.
Notes:
Status: Translated 100%! Good job, me!

And manually formatted 100%! Good job once again, me!!!

Japanese:
<S0>からだをまるめて てきからの
ダメージを かるくする<*4>
English:
Rolls up in a ball to
mitigate damage taken.<*4>
Draft version: Rolls up in a ball to mitigate damage taken.

Japanese:
<S0>からだの いろを かえて
すがたを かくすことができる<*4>
English:
It can conceal itself by
changing color.<*4>
Draft version: It can conceal itself by changing color.

Japanese:
<S0>なんでも きリさく かたい
ツメで こうげきする<*4>
English:
Attacks using tough
claws that can cut
through anything.<*4>
Draft version: Attacks using tough claws that can cut through anything.

Japanese:
<S0>おしリからでる ドクガスで
ジワジワとダメージをあたえる<*4>
English:
With the poison gas
emitted from its behind,

it can cause damage
bit by bit over time.<*4>
Draft version:
With the poison gas emitted from its behind,

it can cause damage
bit by bit over time.

Japanese:
<S0>すばやさで てきをほんろうし
ツノをつかって こうげきする<*4>
English:
Taunts opponents with
its agility. It attacks
using its horn.<*4>
Draft version: Taunts opponents with its agility. It attacks using its horn.

Japanese:
<S0>どうたいがチョウチンみたいに
のびちぢみする<*4>
English:
Its body expands and
compresses like an
accordion.<*4>
Draft version: Its body expands and compresses like an accordion.
Notes: Changed "paper lantern" to "accordion", as that sort of paper lantern isn't very popular in the West.

Japanese:
<S0>おなかの マークで いまの
キモチを あらわす<*4>
English:
The mark on its stomach
reflects its mood.<*4>
Draft version: The mark on its stomach reflects its mood.

Japanese:
<S0>ぷよぷよとした からだで
ダメージを はんげんする<*4>
English:
Its gelatinous body
reduces the damage it
takes by half.<*4>
Draft version: Its gelatinous body reduces the damage it takes by half.

Japanese:
<S0>くらやみでもみえる めをもち
よるでも たたかえる<*4>
English:
With eyes that see in the
dark, it can fight even
at night.<*4>
Draft version: With eyes that see in the dark, it can fight even at night.

Japanese:
<S0>クチバシから きょうリょくな
こうげきを くリだす<*4>
English:
Unleashes powerful
attacks with its beak.<*4>
Draft version: Unleashes powerful attacks with its beak.

Japanese:
<S0>とてもするどい ツメとキバで 
きリさきこうげきをする<*4>
English:
Shreds its foes with
razor-sharp claws
and fangs.<*4>
Draft version:
Shreds its foes with razor-sharp claws
and fangs.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかに たくさんのタマゴが
あるが なかには なにが?<*4>
English:
It carries eggs on its
back, but what lies inside
them?<*4>
Draft version: It carries eggs on its back, but what might be inside?

Japanese:
<S0>あしのうらの きゅうばんで
どんなところも いどうできる<*4>
English:
The suction cups on its
feet allow it to traverse
any terrain.<*4>
Draft version: The suction cups on its feet allow it to traverse any terrain.

Japanese:
<S0>うつぶせの じょうたいで
すんでいることが おおい<*4>
English:
Typically found lying
face-down.<*4>
Draft version: Typically found lying face-down.

Japanese:
<S0>フサフサした たいもうのした
には てあしがかくれている<*4>
English:
Its legs are hidden under
its bushy fur.<*4>
Draft version: Its legs are hidden under its bushy fur.

Japanese:
<S0>おどろくと カイガラのなかに
みを かくしてしまう<*4>
English:
When startled, it hides
within its shell.<*4>
Draft version: When startled, it hides within its shell.

Japanese:
<S0>リょうてのハサミと シッポの
ドクバリで こうげきする<*4>
English:
Attacks using its pincers
and the stinger on its
tail.<*4>
Draft version: Attacks using its pincers and the stinger on its tail.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにある かおのもようで
てきを まどわせる<*4>
English:
Confuses adversaries
using the face-like
pattern on its back.<*4>
Draft version: Confuses adversaries using the face-like pattern on its back.

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Civilized Denjuu                                   '''

<S0>ハネで かぜを おこして
するどいツメで こうげきする<*4>
English:
Stirs up wind using its
wings, and then attacks
with its sharp claws.<*4>
Draft version: Stirs up wind using its wings, and then attacks with its sharp claws.

Japanese:
<S0>おおきなこぶしから くリだす
パンチはデンジュウカイいち!<*4>
English:
The punches it delivers
with its enormous fists

are unmatched in the
Denjuu World!<*4>
Draft version:
The punches it delivers with its enormous fists

are unmatched in the Denjuu World!

Japanese:
<S0>うみの あさせに なかまと
むれをつくって せいそくする<*4>
English:
Gathered in packs,
it lives together
in the sea shoals.<*4>
Draft version:
Gathered in packs,
it lives together
in the sea shoals.

Japanese:
<S0>ボウシが トレードマーク
カオと オシリが ハートがた<*4>
English:
Its hat is its trademark.

Its face and its butt
are both heart-shaped.<*4>
Draft version:
Its hat is its trademark.

Its face and its butt are both heart-shaped.

Japanese:
<S0>リょうかたのヒレを ひっしに
はばたかせて ちゅうにうく<*4>
English:
Hovers by frantically
flapping its
shoulder fins.<*4>
Draft version:
Hovers by frantically flapping its
shoulder fins.

Japanese:
<S0>おしリのとっきからドクバリを
とばして こうげきする<*4>
English:
Shoots poison needles
from the protrusion on
its abdomen.<*4>
Draft version: Shoots poison needles from the protrusion on its abdomen.

Japanese:
<S0>やこうせいのため ひるまは
かくれていることが おおい<*4>
English:
Being a nocturnal
creature, it often hides
during the day.<*4>
Draft version: Being a nocturnal creature, it often hides during the day.

Japanese:
<S0>すいちゅうに すんでいるが
そらを とぶことも できる<*4>
English:
Although it lives
underwater, it is capable
of flight.<*4>
Draft version: Although it lives underwater, it is capable of flight.

Japanese:
<S0>からだじたいを かいてんさせ
たつまきを おこせる<*4>
English:
By gyrating its body,
it can create whirlwinds.<*4>
Draft version:
By gyrating its body,
it can create whirlwinds.

Japanese:
<S0>リっぱなあしと おなかにある
なぞのポケットが とくちょう<*4>
English:
Among its most
distinguishing features
are its capable legs
and the mysterious pouch
on its stomach.<*4>
Draft version:
Among its most distinguishing features are its capable legs
and the mysterious pouch on its stomach.

Japanese:
<S0>ながくひらベったい シッポを
まるめて こうげきしてくる<*4>
English:
Curls up its long,
flat tail and uses it to
attack.<*4>
Draft version:
Curls up its long,
flat tail and uses it to attack.

Japanese:
<S0>2ほんあしで たっているが
すばやく はしることができる<*4>
English:
Despite being bipedal, it
can run at great speeds.<*4>
Draft version: Despite being bipedal, it can run at great speeds.

Japanese:
<S0>かんせつがない ながいうでを
ふリまわして なぐリかかる <*4>
English:
Throws punches by
swinging its long,
jointless arms.<*4>
Draft version:
Throws punches by swinging its long,
jointless arms.

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうおんぱのような こえで 
てきを こんらんさせてしまう<*4>
English:
Disorients its foes with a
near-ultrasonic voice.<*4>
Draft version: Disorients its foes with a near-ultrasonic voice.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにある おおきなツメを
のばして とっしんこうげき<*4>
English:
Extends the large claws
on its back and charges
at its foes.<*4>
Draft version: Extends the large claws on its back and charges at its foes.

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Techno Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>ほのおのつばさで ひこうして
てきの ようすを うかがう<*4>
English:
It uses its fiery wings
takes to the skies.

From up high, it
surveys its enemies
at a distance.<*4>
Draft version:
It uses its fiery wings takes to the skies.

From up high, it
surveys its enemies
at a distance.

Japanese:
<S0>てきを こんらん させてから
あたまのツノで こうげきする<*4>
English:
After disorienting the
opponent, it attacks
using its horn.<*4>
Draft version: After disorienting the opponent, it attacks using its horn.

Japanese:
<S0>トレードマークの おおきな
ドリルで とっしんこうげき<*4>
English:
Charges at opponents
with its trademark drill.<*4>
Draft version: Charges at opponents with its trademark drill.

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうの とっきから
てっきゅうを うちだす<*4>
English:
Shoots iron balls from
the bumps that cover
its body.<*4>
Draft version:
Shoots iron balls from the bumps that cover
its body.

Japanese:
<S0>あたまの カラの なかには
ランチャーが かくされている<*4>
English:
A rocket launcher is
hidden beneath the shell

Draft version: A rocket launcher is hidden beneath the shell on its head.

Japanese:
<S0>かいてんして くうきのわを
つくリだし こうげきする<*4>
English:
It spins to create rings
of air, which it then uses
to attack.<*4>
Draft version: It spins to create rings of air, which it then uses to attack.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかには きょうリょくな
じゅうを そうびしている<*4>
English:
It's equipped with a
powerful gun on its back.<*4>
Draft version: It's equipped with a powerful gun on its back.

Japanese:
<S0>かおはまさしく カバそのもの
おおきなキバでてきにかみつく<*4>
English:
While it undoubtedly has
the face of a hippo,

it also has prominent
tusks to sink into
opponents.<*4>
Draft version:
While it undoubtedly has the face of a hippo,

it also has prominent tusks to sink into opponents.

Japanese:
<S0>あたまについているカッターの
はを かいてんさせて とぶ<*4>
English:
It revolves the blades
attached to its head in
order to fly.<*4>
Draft version: It revolves the blades attached to its head in order to fly.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかに たくさんついている 
バクダンを むしってなげる<*4>
English:
Can pick and throw the
countless bombs it
carries on its back.<*4>
Draft version: Can pick and throw the countless bombs it carries on its back.

Japanese:
<S0>ぶあついヒズメで どんなもの
でもふみつけてペシャンコに!<*4>
English:
By trampling things

hooves, it is able to

an unidentifiable paste.<*4>
Draft version:
By trampling things
with its massive
hooves, it is able to
turn most everything to an unidentifiable paste.

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうにある トゲを
てきにとばして しびれさせる<*4>
English:
Paralyzes opponents by
launching the spikes that
cover its body.<*4>
Draft version: Paralyzes opponents by launching the spikes that cover its body.

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうろうのひとリ コウラ
には ぶきがつまっている<*4>
English:
One of the elders.
Its shell is covered
in weapons.<*4>
Draft version:
One of the elders.
Its shell is covered
in weapons.

Japanese:
<S0>フサフサの けのなかには
ミサイルを かくしもっている<*4>
English:
Conceals missiles under
its shaggy fur.<*4>
Draft version: Conceals missiles under its shaggy fur.

Japanese:
<S0>くうちゅうから ツメや
マシンガンで こうげきする<*4>
English:
Attacks from above
using its claws and its
machine gun.<*4>
Draft version: Attacks from above using its claws and its machine gun.

Japanese:
<S0>ワキから むすうのアシがでて
ムカデのように はしれる<*4>
English:
Countless legs sprout
from its sides. It runs
like a centipede.<*4>
Draft version: Countless legs sprout from its sides. It runs like a centipede.

Japanese:
<S0>さかだちじょうたいで ツノと
シッポを つかって こうげき<*4>
English:
Standing on its hands, it
uses both its horn and
its tail to attack.<*4>
Draft version: Standing on its hands, it uses both its horn and its tail to attack.

Japanese:
<S0>きょうリょくな ほのおけいの
こうげきを とくいとする<*4>
English:
Powerful flame attacks
are its specialty.<*4>
Draft version: Powerful flame attacks are its specialty.

Japanese:
<S0>そとからはみえないが かたに
ボンベが ないぞうされている<*4>
English:
Although you can't tell

appearance,
its shoulders have gas
cylinders built in.<*4>
Draft version:
Although you can't tell from its outward appearance,
its shoulders have gas cylinders built in.

Japanese:
<S0>おおきなツノで てきをはさみ 
せなかのビームでこうげきする<*4>
English:
Grabs foes with its
oversized pincers and
subsequently attacks

cannon mounted
on its back.<*4>
Draft version:
Grabs foes with its oversized pincers and subsequently attacks
by firing the beam cannon mounted
on its back.

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Big Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>ヘルメットにからだをすっぽリ
いれて ダメージをかるくする<*4>
English:
Mitigates damage by
taking shelter within
its helmet.<*4>
Draft version:
Mitigates damage by taking shelter within
its helmet.

Japanese:
<S0>おこるとヒレをたて いかくし
てきをひるませ こうげきする<*4>
English:
When angered, its fins
fan out to intimidate
the foe.
It attacks while they're
startled by its size.<*4>
Draft version:
When angered, its fins fan out to intimidate
the foe.
It attacks while they're startled by its size.

Japanese:
<S0>まるまって トゲのボールに
すがたをかえて とっしんする<*4>
English:
Curls up in a spiky ball
and careens toward
its opponent.<*4>
Draft version:
Curls up in a spiky ball and careens toward
its opponent.

Japanese:
<S0>からだが あなだらけなので
しっぽからふくとフエになる?<*4>
English:
Covered in holes.
Would blowing on its tail
make it a flute?<*4>
Draft version:
Covered in holes.
Would blowing on its tail make it a flute?

Japanese:
<S0>かたのパーツで ぼうぎょして
するどいツメで こうげきする<*4>
English:
Its shoulder plating
protects it while attack-
ing with its sharp claws.<*4>
Draft version: Its shoulder plating protects it while attack-ing with its sharp claws.

Japanese:
<S0>だっぴちゅうのようだが...
ぬいだらどうなるの?<*4>
English:
It seems to be in the
process of shedding.

What do you think it'll
look like when it's
finished?<*4>
Draft version:
It seems to be in the process of shedding.

What do you think it'll look like when it's finished?

Japanese:
<S0>からだのあちこちが するどい
はもののようになっている<*4>
English:
Sharp, blade-like
growths stick out
all over its body.<*4>
Draft version:
Sharp, blade-like growths stick out
all over its body.

Japanese:
<S0>ジャンプ ひとつで すごい
じしんを おこすことができる<*4>
English:
It can cause massive
earthquakes simply by
jumping.<*4>
Draft version: It can cause massive earthquakes simply by jumping.

Japanese:
<S0>しょくしゅの さきの トゲを
つかい デンキこうげきをする<*4>
English:
Unleashes electric
attacks through the
conductive spikes
on the ends of its
tentacles.<*4>
Draft version:
Unleashes electric attacks through the conductive spikes
on the ends of its tentacles.

Japanese:
<S0>ほうまんなボディーをつかって
きょうリょくな タックル<*4>
English:
Delivers powerful tackles
with its corpulent body.<*4>
Draft version: Delivers powerful tackles with its corpulent body.

Japanese:
<S0>すばやいうごきで すがたを
みうしなわせ こうげきする<*4>
English:
With swift movements,
it makes opponents
lose sight of it.
It strikes while they're
still confused.<*4>
Draft version:
With swift movements,
it makes opponents
lose sight of it.
It strikes while they're still confused.

Japanese:
<S0>なんと からだの うしろから 
ほのおが ふきだしている<*4>
English:
By some unknown
mechanism, flames
spout from its back.<*4>
Draft version:
By some unknown mechanism, flames
spout from its back.

Japanese:
<S0>えものを とらえるように
すばやいうごきで おいこむ<*4>
English:
It moves quickly and
corners its prey in order
to catch it.<*4>
Draft version: It moves quickly and corners its prey in order to catch it.

Japanese:
<S0>タマゴのなかには いったい 
なにが はいっているのかな?<*4>
English:
Just what could be
inside that egg?<*4>
Draft version:
Just what could be
inside that egg?

Japanese:
<S0>おおごえで さけび ひるんだ
ところで なぐリかかってくる<*4>
English:
Lets out loud yells,
and subsequently strikes

while the opponent is
reeling from the shock.<*4>
Draft version:
Lets out loud yells,
and subsequently strikes

while the opponent is reeling from the shock.

Japanese:
<S0>うつぶせになって てきに
きづかれずに せっきんする<*4>
English:
Lies face-down and
edges unnoticed toward
its enemy.<*4>
Draft version: Lies face-down and edges unnoticed toward its enemy.

Japanese:
<S0>ひらひらしたマントの したの
ボディは ひ.み.つ!<*4>
English:
There is indeed a body

fluttering cape...
But what it looks like

Draft version:
There is indeed a body hidden under the fluttering cape...
But what it looks like
is a secret!

Japanese:
<S0>ひらいているカラを とじると
ぼうぎょけいたいになる<*4>
English:
Goes into defense mode

Draft version: Goes into defense mode by closing its shell.

Japanese:
<S0>ふたまたにわかれた シッポと 
おおきなハサミが とくちょう<*4>
English:
Its strengths are its
two-pronged tail and
large pincers.<*4>
Draft version: Its strengths are its two-pronged tail and large pincers.

Japanese:
<S0>ひだリのツメで つかまえて
みぎのサーベルで こうげき<*4>
English:
Its left claw is used to
grab opponents,

and its right is a sabre
it then attacks them
with.<*4>
Draft version:
Its left claw is used to grab opponents,

and its right is a sabre it then attacks them with.

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Burst Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>うでの するどいブレードで
どんなものでも きリさく<*4>
English:
Using the sharp blades
on its arms, it can cut
through anything.<*4>
Draft version: Using the sharp blades on its arms, it can cut through anything.

Japanese:
<S0>うでの とがったハンマーで
てきを ふんさいする<*4>
English:
Pulverizes opponents
using the pointed
hammers on its arms.<*4>
Draft version: Pulverizes opponents using the pointed hammers on its arms.

Japanese:
<S0>れいきを ふきかけて てきの
ぼうぎょリょくを よわめる<*4>
English:
Weakens its opponent's
defenses by blowing ice-
cold air at them.<*4>
Draft version: Weakens its opponent's defenses by blowing ice-cold air at them.

Japanese:
<S0>こもリうたを うたい てきを
ねむらせて こうげきする<*4>
English:
Puts foes to sleep by
singing lullabies.

While they're asleep, it

Draft version:
Puts foes to sleep by singing lullabies.

While they're asleep, it can attack unhindered.

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにドクロのマークがあリ

English:
A skull-like pattern can

by rattling its tail.<*4>
Draft version:
A skull-like pattern can be found on its back.

It intimidates opponents by rattling its tail.

Japanese:
<S0>とっきぶつから れいきゃく
ガスをだして こごえさせる<*4>
English:
Shoots cooling gas
from the protrusion

freezing everything
it hits.<*4>
Draft version:
Shoots cooling gas
from the protrusion
on its abdomen,
freezing everything
it hits.

Japanese:
<S0>ツメをつかってちょうおんぱを

English:
It is able to generate
ultrasonic waves by
swiping its claws.<*4>
Draft version: It is able to generate ultrasonic waves by swiping its claws.

Japanese:
<S0>からだのなかにデンキをためて

English:
Builds up electricity
within its body and
releases it in one go.<*4>
Draft version: It builds up electricity within its body and releases it in one go.

Japanese:
<S0>かぜが まるでリボンのように

English:
Ribbon-like winds
envelop its body.<*4>
Draft version:
Ribbon-like winds
envelop its body.

Japanese:
<S0>じょうぶな リょうあしで
すばやく うごくことができる<*4>
English:
Its sturdy legs allow it
to move quickly and
nimbly.<*4>
Draft version: Its sturdy legs allow it to move quickly and nimbly.

Japanese:
<S0>とてもかたいトゲつきシッポを
ふリまわして こうげきする<*4>
English:
Attacks by swinging its
thorny tail like a club.<*4>
Draft version: Attacks by swinging its thorny tail like a club.

Japanese:
<S0>あたまがおもいので しっぽで
バランスを たもっている<*4>
English:
Since its head is so
heavy, it balances
using its tail.<*4>
Draft version:
Since its head is so heavy, it balances
using its tail.

Japanese:
<S0>おこらせると ながいうでを
ふリまわしてとっしんしてくる<*4>
English:
When angered, it swings
its long arms about

and charges wildly at its
opponent.<*4>
Draft version:

Draft version:

English:

Draft version: Draws its power from the air all around it.

English:
On its back is a mouth

Its body is covered in

Draft version: Can freely manipulate water. A mysterious Denjuu indeed.

Its long arms allow it to

Draft version: Its long arms allow it to move effortlessly through the forest.

No matter when, what,

Draft version: <S0>No matter when, what, or where – this Denjuu is always angry.

Draft version:
